channel.title: Private server auto restarter if crashed
channel.description:
You will need endserver.dat and mswinscn.OCX get that here:
http://www.ascentive.com/support/3126InstallList.html
Location the runserver ,endserver and the program should be:-
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\
Also let it access the internet
RAR:
http://www.uploadit.biz/download.php?filename=restart18096.rar
ZIP:
http://www.uploadit.biz/download.php?filename=restart67611.zip
Tell me if you get any bugs.

item.title: Private server auto restarter if crashed
item.dc:creator: @hellou hellou
item.description:
@hellou wrote:

um in endserver …

tskill java /a

Haxor62:

wrong section…

Hows it in wrong section? this is a program and its in programs area

Updated links should be bug free now

item.title: Private server auto restarter if crashed
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

err wtf? in your batch file…

:start
java server [args]
goto start

…you dont need to download anything, you just need a bit of sense about you
